# cURL Statements

Let us assume the environment is `test` and the base URL is: https://hvyqxor7te.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/test

Please set the URL in a shell variable. Using the User Session API, please obtain the id token and assign it to a variable ACCESS_TOKEN

```shell script
URL=https://hvyqxor7te.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/test
ACCESS_TOKEN=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IlFrSXpSVFkxTlRjMk1ESkVRVFJEUkRFeFF6RTBOekl3T1RnMlF6RkZNalExUWpNMlJFWXdNdyJ9..ISoJtgVDHch88KLtmkEcgBPY7C-0FPIWByADh1v9q2Cmqfj6DG96P4W4ZaVREQKsiHxn4qavGZIm3_jTyqxYq6FiShqEhnpeoXQ_kXyYxMHtlbmK4FTah7l5LPW0W7EALBv9boTpH9bP2i_IXF-EIGGxEzuYfgHJIDnR2RxLTYAODUTjcIHiHr32hOcM42KdeJEzDLtbKP1_R2gMkb0ZznUPWi0JCt1_AVPkTswQxDuROwP6UnNlqgXoaiQ3Aw_U0qkJEcgxKfXhcY6PPqeEj3KZt0xpraTECxMSAvFQptAPhbFYGjTBPdlNwYC5GBpKJH-HAO2e7OeVL6Mc1fpoJA
```
